about_the_game:
Creator Expansion and Original Soundtrack is a downloadable content (DLC) for the game “One More Question”.

This DLC includes the original tracks used in the game (in OGG format), character portraits, and creator badges. The portraits and badges can be changed in the
Puzzle Story Workshop Editor within the game, providing more personalized options.

If additional tracks, badges, and portraits are added in the future, they will be included and updated directly within this DLC, without releasing new DLCs for these items. Feel confident in your purchase.

The directory structure of the resources included in this DLC is as follows:

├─Mark
│ m1.png
│ m2.png
│ m3.png
│ m4.png
│ m5.png
│ m6.png
│ m7.png
│ m8.png
│
├─Music
│ Rain And Leaves' Song.ogg
│ Invitation Of Sunflowers.ogg
│ Blue Is Nice' Song.ogg
│ Yellow's Fishing Song.ogg
│ Good Morning Yellow(Loop Ver.).ogg
│ Good Morning Yellow.ogg
│ Opening.ogg
│ Unexpected.ogg
│ Insomnia In A Foggy Night.ogg
│ Visiting Night.ogg
│ Long for day and night.ogg
│ Millenium beyond the door.ogg
│
└─Portrait
p1.png
p2.png
p3.png
p4.png
p5.png
p6.png
p7.png
p8.png
pp1.png
pp2.png

======Staff========
UI Design：Yahu
Composing/Arranging：Douzi

======Note======
The music content is for personal collection only.
It can not be uploaded to video or music platforms, nor used for commercial purposes or derivative works.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+(1GB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space

short_description: Includes downloadable original tracks used in the game. Allows the game to configure additional creator portraits and badges.
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
